website_summaries.verdict: With a carefully selected blend of soothing essential oils, this option delivers fast acting relief from muscular aches and pains while eliminating the need to mix and match. Reliable quality and efficacy.
pros: Formulated with a well balanced blend of wintergreen, peppermint, chamomile blue, eucalyptus, and camphor to quickly quell pain and inflammation
Earns praise for its speedy, deep penetrating action
Works for both muscle and joint pain
Backed by a company that's committed to excellence
cons: The larger bottles don't come with droppers, which can lead to unnecessary waste and mess

customer_reviews.title: Something is off
customer_reviews.text: I've bought the 10ml in the past and they seem to be more evenly mixed. The 60ml is very heavy on the camphor. It makes me sad as I bought this with the intention splitting into roller bottles and sharing with some coworkers. I should have suspected something with the price difference as some of the other oils are more expensive. It still has some of the pain relief effects but the STRONG camphor smell discourages use.
customer_reviews.author: DF Daugherty

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for easing of muscle pain
customer_reviews.text: There are superior results for sore and tired muscles when you add a dozen or so drops into a carrier oil such as coconut, which is what I chose of the variety mentioned as suitable. My husband and a friend have both commented how this essential oil has helped when other, supposedly stronger, but also more expensive, prescription rub ons have had no effect. If you order this go ahead and get the large size and get a carrier oil and some small bottles to put it in, either roll on or spray on, both of which I have. The oil is a combination of several essential oils and has a not unpleasant scent.
customer_reviews.author: Reading since 9

customer_reviews.title: Works well for my knee pain!
customer_reviews.text: I have not had a problem with this company's oils at all! This Deep Muscle Relief oil works. It does have a strong menthol type odor but I don't mind if it works! The odor doesn't long but the relief does. For my knees I put some on with fractionation coconut oil upon waking, and before going to bed. The knee pain is so much more manageable! The French lavender oil by Healing Solutions calmed and healed some burns, too. Great oils!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This oil is great!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was very skeptical of essential oils before trying these. This deep muscle oil is awesome. No matter where I have used it... I have found relief. I don't think I will ever be without it. I was using way to much ibuprofen to get relief from pains and this knocks it out in a fraction of the time.
customer_reviews.author: D Shipe

customer_reviews.title: the best thing on the market.Works absolutely Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Works almost Instantly. This stuff is amazing I would recommend it to anyone who has muscle pain or sore muscles it’s absolutely the best thing on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Siudzinski

customer_reviews.title: This oil is essential
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works great and smells incredible. As far as I've done my research this is also a very high quality blend with no fillers. Needless to say I'm very impressed.
customer_reviews.author: Fake review? Definitely not.

customer_reviews.text: I bought this essential oil for my Mother in law, so she could help my Father in law. He hurt his back and I knew this oil being massaged on his back would help. The shipping and delivery were very quick and I am appreciative of that.

He says the deep relief blend relives pain better than any other product he has tried. I don't mind giving him a rub down with this oil because it doesn't have a strong odor or burn my hands.

My hubby rubs this deep muscle relief on my lower back, i feel the warming effect, then after the warming effect, the pain goes away pretty quicky. My hubby and i love love this essential oil of the deep muscle relief. I will be ordering a bigger bottle of this deep muscle relief soon. My hubby and i are very very happy with this product.

customer_reviews.title: I never got the product. Only part of my ...
customer_reviews.text: I never got the product. Only part of my order was delivered. Seems to be impossible to get my point across and find out what to do next. I paid for this product and I don't have it.

customer_reviews.title: This larger bottle did not have a stopper that worked and it did not stay in....a mess and lost a bunch of it.
customer_reviews.text: I have used this product before in a smaller size and been very pleased with the way the small bottle only allows a drop or two out at a time and how well it works. This large bottle arrived, I opened it up, saw a plastic piece on the top of the bottle. I needed it on the back of my neck. As I moved it across my shoulder the plastic piece fell off and about a quarter of the bottle spilled on my back, dress and underwear. I have had to wash my dress 3 times and it still smells. Did it have a defective plastic stop? I can't get the piece back in....Disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Jo B

customer_reviews.title: Pain be GONE!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is AMAZING! I have a bottle of pain relief oils that I paid $30 for...and this works much, MUCH better. I had to buy another bottle, because my parents loved it so much I gave them my original bottle. Mix with a carrier oil and use as needed. It's not a permanent fix for the pain, but it makes the day so much less painful!
customer_reviews.author: Ricki O

customer_reviews.title: you will try anything- and I'm glad I gave this oil a chance
customer_reviews.text: I originally purchased an "assortment" package of different types of essential oils -they were in 10ml bottles (very small but I didn't want to invest a lot of $ until I knew if they would be helpful)and this deep muscle oil was included in that package. I have since upgraded to a much larger bottle because I want to have it on hand. It has worked every time I use it-generally for back pain. I apply it undiluted and usually realize about 30 min later that I am in much less pain and often completely pain free. When your back hurts, you will try anything- and I'm glad I gave this oil a chance.
customer_reviews.author: holly lee

customer_reviews.title: A MUST have!!
customer_reviews.text: I have bought several of these and given them to friends who also had sore muscles (whether from sports, working too hard, injury, of old age) they ALL have continued to use it buying the 2 oz bottle for themselves.

product_meta.title: Deep Muscle Relief Blend Essential Oil - 100% Pure Therapeutic Grade Deep Muscle Relief Blend Oil - 60ml
product_meta.description:
Size:60mlHealing Solutions 100% Pure Essential oils are bottled in UV blocking amber essential oil bottles. 

Our Chief Scientist tests every batch of oil for purity in our in-house, state of art GC-MS Laboratory. This ensures every product sold is 100% pure essential oil! 

The Leading Aromatherapy Associations (Alliance of International Aromatherapists (AIA), International Aromatherapy and Aromatic Medicine Association, Aromatherapy Trade Council, and others) all state that essential oils should not be taken internally (regardless of purity or organic origin) unless under the guidance of a health care practitioner trained at an appropriate level . As such, all of our oils carry a label warning that the product is NOT FOR INTERNAL USE. 

What sets Healing Solutions Essential Oils apart is superior cultivation of ingredients that are the best in the world. Combined with superior distillation and bottling care process, We GUARANTEE that our oils are aromatically superior and more effective than any other oils - if you disagree we will refund your money!
feature_bullets: The most UNIQUE and AMAZING SMELLING Deep Muscle Relief Blend on the market, in our opinion. If you are not ABSOLUTELY amazed, receive a full refund from the manufacturer, Healing Solutions, no questions asked!

SUPERIOR EXPERIENCE: If you are just trying our Deep Muscle Relief Blend for the first time and you do not switch to it permanently as your new favorite oil the manufacturer, Healing Solutions, will refund your money, guaranteed.

PURE + RIGOROUS QUALITY TESTING & CONTROLS: Distillation facility is GMP, ISO 9001 and Kosher certified. Make sure ALL oils you buy have these qualifications * CHECK OUT OUR REVIEWS!! * In our opinion our oil is superior to organic and THE MOST RARE, BEST SMELLING, AND MOST THERAPEUTICALLY EFFECTIVE OF ALL Deep Muscle Relief Blend (Blend)
Healing Solutions is SUPERIOR because it offers over 170 different oils for blending/pairing.
